name: Duel (itch) (Will B. Stevenson)
description:
DUEL

Challenge your friends with this 1-D Pong Clone.

The closer the ball to your goal, the faster your return speed. Hone your reflexes and perfect your play. 2 PLAYER GAME ONLY

CONTROLS:

A - Blue (Left) Player Hit

L - Red (Right) Player Hit

First player too 11 points wins!
